entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @AmyMcGrathKY He's partially right, you know. While the impeachment was going on, did YOU know anything about coronavirus? I realize that they *should* have gotten daily briefings, but in reality, a virus that's 3,000+ miles away is less of a priority than what's happening here.
